stories.text:
Hi Hacker News! I wanted to ask about the process of finalist selection on the accelerator Pioneer.app.

My question is, if one has been selected as a finalist and interviewed, how long will they have to wait for a concrete confirmation of actually being selected as a Pioneer?

Will Pioneer also send you an Email if they have rejected you?

Please let me know if you have experiences about this, or have some knowledge regarding this process. I'm kind of lost amid many information found online.

Thanks in advance!
stories.title: Ask HN: Pioneer.app Accelerator Finalist Selection
